page.title: 02INDUSTRY - WHITEBIRK ESTATE
page.content:
This estate began seventeen years ago. There are now about thirty companies based there, twelve being new or new branches of established companies. Over two thousand five hundred people are employed on the estate.
RANGE OF PRODUCTS. Engineering. Timber frame bldgs. Computer technology. Carpet printing. Lead/Acid batteries. Silk textile screens. Service companies: fuel oil, food/drink liquid propane gas, toy importer.
RAW MATERALS. Found mainly within U.K. though some imported from Europe and Saudi Arabia.
EXPORTS. World wide.
